name: Potion Panic (Javi Rodriguez)
description:
Potion PanicGMTK Game Jam 2020 Submission

The village has been curse. Use potions to return villagers and animals back to normal. Mix potions to create new potions.

How to play:

Drag and drop potions on a villager or sheep to see their effects.

Drag two potions into the cauldron to create a new potion.

Use potions to match the image on the right and score.
